author: inugent
body:
Adding new B-physics gen-fragments to Configuration/generator + including them in the standard generator relval. Will recommends that for the regular Relval these samples are run with:
 runTheMatrix.py --what generator -l 541 --command " -n 150000 "
 runTheMatrix.py --what generator -l 542 --command " -n 200000 "
 runTheMatrix.py --what generator -l 543 --command " -n 50000 "
 runTheMatrix.py --what generator -l 544 --command " -n 2500000 "
(Discussions/optimization on 544 may be needed to get full stats due to low filter rate - no current solution so limited stats is better then none).
Ian 
Automatically ported from CMSSW_7_4_X #7750
title: Evt gen gen frag update
